page.title: 08THREE ORRELL INTERVIEWS
page.content: {WOMAN (ABOUT 60 YRS)}Lived in area for 21 years.Not born in Orrell.Likes area and facilities e.g. village shops,bus and train services.Often travels to Wigan and St.Helens to shop.Noted lack of entertainments. {MAN (66 YRS)}Lived in area all life.Noted considerable change e.g. roads from cobbles to tarmac; horses replaced by cars.Disapproved of changes.Uses corner shop regularly. Travels mainly by bus. {WOMAN (ABOUT 50 YRS)}Originated from Ireland.Still considers herself "new". Prefers Orrell to Up-Holland since it reminds her of her homeland.Attributes her preference for shopping in Wigan to a lack of car parking space in St.Helens.Uses local pubs and off-licences regularly.
